NL Question: What are the names of the species that have a 'mammal' classification and whose homeworld, 'Ryloth', has a temperate climate?
Cypher: MATCH (s:Species)-[:HOMEWORLD]->(p:Planet) WHERE s.classification = 'mammals' AND p.name = 'Ryloth' AND p.climate CONTAINS 'temperate' RETURN s.name
